title: PBE account
body: My pbe login is suddenly not working. I haven't gotten an email about it being disabled, so was just curious of what was going on. Thanks! :)

replies.body: hit up our account recovery agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)! After verifying your normal account that is attached to your PBE account, we can take a look to see what happened and start the process of getting it fixed!
